enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: PDB0 output trigger drives FTM0 hardware trigger 1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM1 channel match drives FTM0 hardware trigger 1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_FLT0 pin drives FTM0 hardware trigger 2

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: XBARA output 34 drives FTM0 hardware trigger 2

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0 channel match drives FTM1 hardware trigger 0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: XBARA output 35 drives FTM1 hardware trigger 2

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: PDB1 output trigger drives FTM3 hardware trigger 1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: XBARA output 37 drives FTM3 hardware trigger 2

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: UART0_TX pin modulated by FTM1 CH0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: UART1_TX pin modulated by FTM1 CH0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Write 1 to assert the TRIG0 input to FTM0, software must clear this bit to allow other trigger sources to assert

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Write 1 to assert the TRIG0 input to FTM1, software must clear this bit to allow other trigger sources to assert

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Write 1 to assert the TRIG0 input to FTM3, software must clear this bit to allow other trigger sources to assert

field.name: FTM0CFSEL
field.description: Carrier frequency selection for FTM0 output channel

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM1 CH1 provides the carrier signal for FTM0 Timer Modulation mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: LPTMR0 prescaler output provides the carrier signal for FTM0 Timer Modulation mode

field.name: FTM3CFSEL
field.description: Carrier frequency selection for FTM3 output channel

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM1 CH1 provides the carrier signal for FTM3 Timer Modulation mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: LPTMR0 prescaler output provides the carrier signal for FTM3 Timer Modulation mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH0 pin is output of FTM0 CH0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH0 pin is output of FTM0 CH0, modulated by carrier frequency clock, as per FTM0CFSEL

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH1 pin is output of FTM0 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH1 pin is output of FTM0 CH1, modulated by carrier frequency clock, as per FTM0CFSEL

enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH2 pin is output of FTM0 channel 2 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH2 pin is output of FTM0 channel 2 output, modulated by carrier frequency clock, as per FTM0CFSEL

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0 external clock driven by FTM_CLK0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0 external clock driven by FTM_CLK1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0 external clock driven by FTM_CLK2 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: FTM1 external clock driven by FTM_CLK0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: FTM1 external clock driven by FTM_CLK1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0100
enumeratedValue.description: Kinetis family of this device. This is the Vseries

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Flash remains enabled during Wait mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Flash is disabled for the duration of Wait mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: CMP0 Sample/Window input is driven by both PDB0 and PDB1 pluse-out channel 0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: CMP1 Sample/Window input is driven by both PDB0 and PDB1 pluse-out channel 1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: CMP2 Sample/Window input is driven by both PDB0 and PDB1 pluse-out channel 2

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: CMP3 Sample/Window input is driven by both PDB0 and PDB1 pluse-out channel 3

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: DAC0 can be triggered by both PDB0 interval trigger 0 and PDB1 interval trigger 0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Internal 1 kHz clock is source to WDOG2008

field.name: SRPDN
field.description: Nanoedge Regulator 2.7V and 1.2V Supply Powerdown Control

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: Nanoedge regulator placed in normal mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: Nanoedge regulator placed in powerdown mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: Nanoedge regulator placed in normal mode and SRPDN is write protected until chip reset

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Nanoedge regulator placed in powerdown mode and SRPDN is write protected until chip reset

field.name: SR27STDBY
field.description: Nanoedge Regulator 2.7 V Supply Standby Control

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: Nanoedge regulator 2.7 V placed in normal mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: Nanoedge regulator 2.7 V placed in standby mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: Nanoedge regulator 2.7 V supply placed in normal mode and SR27STDBY is write protected until chip reset

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Nanoedge regulator 2.7 V supply placed in standby mode and SR27STDBY is write protected until chip reset

field.name: SR12STDBY
field.description: Nanoedge Regulator 1.2 V Supply Standby Control

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: Nanoedge regulator 1.2 V supply placed in normal mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: Nanoedge regulator 1.2 V supply placed in standby mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: Nanoedge regulator 1.2 V supply placed in normal mode and SR12STDBY is write protected until chip reset

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Nanoedge regulator 1.2 V supply placed in standby mode and SR12STDBY is write protected until chip reset

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Power supply for nanoedge isn't ready

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Power supply for nanoedge is OK
